title: Surprise Party Shaco Idea
body: Just a random idea. Was thinking... Huh only two surprise party skins? Amumu and Fiddle can both sneak into fights. What better champion next then Shaco, the annoying invisible fear boxing shiv throwing clone champion?

replies.body:
QUALIFYING MY POST: I'M NOT AN ARTIST

http://imgur.com/mQxcpDt

This is why riot is one of my favorite companies.

Other companies wouldnt dare make lovley bad ms paint drawings.
better than anything I could draw
I lol'd
Not bad, not bad. But it could use some green streamers, you know? It's just missing that green.
It's beautiful.
Awesome idea! Surprise Party Eve would be cool too.

i cant picture that you're gonna have to draw it out like your buddy over there, Kappa

I GOTCHU.

>
> Awesome idea! Surprise Party Eve would be cool too.

{{champion:28}}  "~Happy Birthday to me~." {{champion:28}} 

(Sorry, had to.)
I mean that could be one of her lines or she could say "I've got the cake~" instead of "I've got the touch"

> [{quoted}](name=iShamrocks,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uurdM4KW,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2015-04-05T02:31:51.643+0000)
>
> I mean that could be one of her lines or she could say "I've got the cake~" instead of "I've got the touch"

I was just making a joke with a seductive connotation, but yeah, that would be a nice quote.
Surprise Party Nocturne!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Meowriko,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uurdM4KW,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-03T23:38:13.453+0000)
>
> Awesome idea! Surprise Party Eve would be cool too.

Her ult would be a birthday cake! 
I can imagine her Q (which you basically press non-stop) to make extremely silly sounds :D
i approve

I suggest Surprise Party {{champion:154}}. Just imagine it, a Zac coming in from a max range E yelling "SURPRISE!" and when he ults, "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!"

Edit 1
And to stay in the "Party" Theme Zac could be a balloon figure and have a helium effect applied to his voice as he gets smaller (takes dmg) and make it deeper as he gets more health. (Saw this idea a while ago on the forms)
good but a better skin would be a duo release of jinx and shaco skins like hey did for tf and eve.

Surprise Party Teemo... Oh god, not Satan, but the skin makes so much sense...
Mushrooms are party mushrooms, he shoots confetti or glitter in your eyes, and he uses a little noisemaker when he moves quick. And when he comes out of stealth, there also shoots out a whole bunch of confetti.
yes

What about Surprise Party Rek'Sai or Twitch? Maybe Twisted Fate?
Then you could do

Rek'Sai top
Fiddles jungle
T Fate mid
Twitch and Evelynn bottom lane (not meta, but it might work out well)

And the enemy team could have surprise party amumu because he wasn't invited.
I think we should have a surprise party OUTSIDE the jungle XD
I still think we need Surprise Party Swain - but with a forever-alone vibe. 'cause trailing burst balloons behind himself during his ultimate would be heart breakingly awesome.
I feel like "giant impact ultimate" is a big part of the surprise, personally.
Best artwork NA. <3 BTW I love the skin idea.
Feels more like surprise buttsex tbh.
